books.author: by Bill O'Reilly and Martin Dugard
books.description: The host of “The O’Reilly Factor” recounts the events surrounding the assassination of John F. Kennedy.
books.name: KILLING KENNEDY

books.author: by Eben Alexander
books.description: A neurosurgeon recounts his near death experience during a coma from bacterial meningitis.
books.name: PROOF OF HEAVEN

books.author: by Mark Owen with Kevin Maurer
books.description: An account of the mission that killed Osama bin Laden, by a former member of the Navy SEALs.
books.name: NO EASY DAY

books.author: by Bill O'Reilly and Martin Dugard
books.description: The host of “The O’Reilly Factor” recounts the assassination of Abraham Lincoln.
books.name: KILLING LINCOLN

books.author: by Danielle Steel
books.description: In this memoir, the novelist describes how she transformed the pain of the loss of her son into an enriching campaign of service.
books.name: A GIFT OF HOPE

books.author: by Peter Ames Carlin
books.description: A biography of Bruce Springsteen looks at his family, his music and his drive for fame and influence.
books.name: BRUCE

books.author: by Todd Burpo with Lynn Vincent
books.description: A father recounts his 3-year-old son’s encounter with Jesus and the angels during an appendectomy.
books.name: HEAVEN IS FOR REAL

books.author: by Jon Ronson
books.description: An investigation of the strange things human beings are willing to believe in.
books.name: LOST AT SEA

books.author: by Rod Stewart
books.description: The pop singer reminisces on his long career.
books.name: ROD

books.author: by Thomas E. Ricks
books.description: A history of American military command from World War II to the present.
books.name: GENERALS

books.author: by Laura Hillenbrand
books.description: An Olympic runner’s story of survival as a prisoner of the Japanese in World War II.
books.name: UNBROKEN

books.author: by Antonio J. Mendez with Malcolm McConnell
books.description: Recollections, first published in 1999,  by the C.I.A. officer who helped six Americans escape from Tehran in 1980; he is played by Ben Affleck in the movie “Argo.”
books.name: THE MASTER OF DISGUISE

books.author: by Nate Silver
books.description: An examination of predictions, the ones that come true and the ones that don’t.
books.name: THE SIGNAL AND THE NOISE

books.author: by Cheryl Strayed
books.description: A woman’s account of a life-changing 1,100-mile hike along the Pacific Crest Trail.
books.name: WILD

books.author: by Rebecca Skloot
books.description: The story of a woman whose cancer cells were cultured without her permission in 1951.
books.name: THE IMMORTAL LIFE OF HENRIETTA LACKS
